ygData.subject: HARMSHIELD what lvl?
ygData.msgSnippet: Someone asked what lvl you should be to research this spell. Well I successfully researched this spell whan I was L20  and I had only tried to make a spell
ygData.messageBody:
Someone asked what lvl you should be to "research" this spell.

Well I successfully "researched this spell whan I was L20" and I had only tried to make a spell 1 other time and when I failed the first time my skill went up to 18, then I tried the harmshield and it work!!! plus I have a 19 now, sweet!!!


Can anyone tell me what is a good use for harmshield? Can I cast after I cast this spell?

LMK thanks!

Skel Lifebane the L20 Necro Gnome (Eci)

;-)

Later Ya'll
